ui.app_subtitle: Generate professional fitness assessment reports in three steps.
ui.login_backend_error: Cannot reach the backend. Is the API server running?
ui.landing_step1_desc: Enter the client's name, age, gender, goals, and body measurements. Body measurements enable auto-computed BMI and Waist-to-Hip Ratio.
ui.landing_step2_desc: Input raw test scores. The logic engine looks up normative data and returns a rating (Excellent → Poor) for each test instantly.
ui.landing_step3_desc: Generate an LLM-powered narrative summary and personalised workout plan, then download a polished PDF for the client.
ui.profile_notes_placeholder: Any relevant context, injuries, or preferences...
ui.profile_body_measurements: Body Measurements *(optional — required for BMI and Waist-to-Hip Ratio)*
ui.profile_goals_error: Please select at least one goal.
ui.profile_saved: Profile saved for **{name}**. Proceed to the **Assessment** page.
ui.assessment_bmi_info: BMI will be computed from height ({height} cm) and weight ({weight} kg).
ui.assessment_bmi_missing: BMI: add height and weight in Client Profile to enable.
ui.assessment_whr_info: Waist-to-Hip Ratio will be computed from waist ({waist} cm) and hip ({hip} cm).
ui.assessment_whr_missing: Waist-to-Hip Ratio: add waist and hip in Client Profile to enable.
ui.assessment_no_tests: Enter at least one test result before calculating.
ui.assessment_success: Ratings calculated. Proceed to the **Report** page.
ui.assessment_progress_caption: Showing progress compared to previous assessment.
ui.assessment_profile_required: Please complete the **Client Profile** page first.
ui.report_generating_for: Generating report for **{name}** based on {count} test result(s).
ui.report_notes_placeholder: Any extra context to help tailor the summary — injuries, recent events, etc.
ui.report_generate_help: Call the LLM to generate a summary and workout plan.
ui.report_regenerate_help: Re-run the LLM to get a fresh summary and workout plan.
ui.report_generating: Generating summary and workout plan — this may take a moment…
ui.report_workout_disclaimer: *Draft for coach review — please adapt as appropriate for this client.*
ui.report_pdf_error: Cannot reach the backend to generate the PDF.
ui.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
ui.signup_success: Account created! You can now sign in.
ui.signup_error_username_taken: That username is already taken. Please choose another.
ui.signup_error_generic: Sign-up failed. Please check your inputs and try again.
ui.signup_already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign in
ui.profile_neck_help: Required for body fat % estimation (US Navy formula).
ui.charts_no_data: No chart data available (need 2+ assessments with thresholds).

pdf.disclaimer: This report is intended as a professional fitness assessment tool for qualified coaches and trainers. It does not constitute medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. All exercise recommendations should be reviewed by a qualified fitness professional before implementation. Clients with existing health conditions should consult a qualified healthcare provider before beginning any exercise programme. This report was generated with AI assistance and is intended as a starting point for the coach's professional review and modification.
